title: President Trump Sends Nominations to the Senate â€“ The White House
content:
Nominations & Appointments			
Issued on:
March 21, 2017
NOMINATIONS SENT TO THE SENATE:Courtney Elwood, of Virginia, to be General Counsel of the Central Intelligence Agency, vice Caroline Diane Krass, resigned.David Malpass, of New York, to be an Under Secretary of the Treasury, vice D. Nathan Sheets.Jeffrey A. Rosen, of Virginia, to be Deputy Secretary of Transportation, vice Victor M. Mendez.Amul R. Thapar, of Kentucky, to be United States Circuit Judge for the Sixth Circuit, vice Boyce F. Martin, Jr., retired.Heather Wilson, of South Dakota, to be Secretary of the Air Force, vice Deborah Lee James.WITHDRAWAL SENT TO THE SENATE:Vincent Viola, of New York, to be Secretary of the Army, vice Eric Kenneth Fanning, which was sent to the Senate on January 20, 2017.
